alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Johnson; Logan (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 09 at 8:45PM CDT until June 11 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Arkansas... Arkansas River at Van Buren affecting Sebastian and Crawford Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas... Arkansas River at Ozark Lock and Dam affecting Logan, Franklin and Johnson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River at Ozark Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 360.0 feet, flooding spreads over more than 4,000 acres in Franklin and Logan Counties. Numerous gas fields are flooded. Some agricultural lands in Johnson County also are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 358.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 359.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. The river is then expected to fluctuate above action stage over the weekend before finally dropping below action stage Sunday night. - Flood stage is 357.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
